85-100.message: You scored %%. With your power, you wield the Infinity Gauntlet! Control the fate of the universe!
You scored %%. Your knowledge spans galaxies. I grant you the Tesseract, master of space!
You scored %%. Reality bends to your will. I present you with the Aether, forge your own destiny!
